Text: Biden is not mincing words today. Trump's comments were not the words of a president. The were the words of segregationists and vicious racists like Bull Connor.

Powerful words from @realDonaldTrump tonight making it clear all Americans are going to be protected.This is what we elected President Trump to do - to lead with bold, dramatic action. These lawless riots ; acts of violence will not continue indefinitely. They will end now.

In 2000, George W(anker) Bush defeated Al Gore by 537 votes. Nader got 97,421 votes. Florida suppressed non-white voters, but my Green Party vote also helped the Clinton legacy to continue ; expand. 20 yrs of guilt is enough for me: #BidenTime #NeverTrump

Please don't just post a black square. Write to your MP now with these demands: - Immediate suspension of UK sales of teargas, riot shields + rubber bullets to the US - Condemn Trump's use of force against his own citizens- Release the delayed report into BAME Covid deaths
Joe Biden is giving his first big speech on the protests. This on Trump's bible photo-op: "I just wished he opened it once in a while rather than brandishing it."

So Twitter partners with the #FakeNews media to censor @realDonaldTrump but they leave @JoeBiden ; Communist Chinese propaganda alone.We always knew Silicon Valley would pull out all the stops to fight Trump.My op-ed:https://t.co/M3cfa3xtyb
Every major network carried Trump live but none carried either of Biden's two events today where he addressed police brutality. Total journalistic malpractice ; repeat of 2016

Trump orchestrating an assault on peaceful protesters so he could hold a bible in front of a church for a photo op is a gross abuse of power ; arguably a violation of the 1st Amendment's right to peaceably assemble. Trump MUST be prosecuted for his crimes against the people.
